00017   void TrackFinderWriteEngine::registerParameters()
00018   {
00019     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(
00020                                                    _engineName+"_prefix",
00021                                                    "TrackFinderWriteEngine prefix to tree variables",
00022                                                    _enginePrefix,
00023                                                    std::string("ptf_") );
00024 
00025     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(
00026                                                    _engineName+"_showerStartColName",
00027                                                    "name of shower start input collection",
00028                                                    _showerStartColName,
00029                                                    std::string("ShowerStartingLayer") );
00030 
00031    _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(
00032                                                    _engineName+"_trackColName",
00033                                                    "name of track input collection",
00034                                                    _trackColName,
00035                                                    std::string("PrimaryTrackHits") );
00036 
00037     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterProcessorParameter(
00038                                                    _engineName+"_numHcalLayers",
00039                                                    "number of HCAL layers",
00040                                                    _fNumHcalLayers,
00041                                                    int(38) );
00042   }

00045   void TrackFinderWriteEngine::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00046   {
00047     hostTree->Branch( (_enginePrefix+"showerStart").c_str(),
00048                       & _fShowerStart,
00049                       (_enginePrefix+"showerStart/I").c_str() );
00050 
00051     hostTree->Branch( (_enginePrefix+"CalorimeterType").c_str(),
00052                       & _fCalorimeterType,
00053                       (_enginePrefix+"CalorimeterType/I").c_str() );
00054 
00055     hostTree->Branch( (_enginePrefix+"eSumTrack").c_str(),
00056                       & _eSumTrack,
00057                       (_enginePrefix+"eSumTrack/F").c_str() );
00058 
00059     hostTree->Branch( (_enginePrefix+"numTrackHits").c_str(),
00060                       & _numTrackHits,
00061                       (_enginePrefix+"numTrackHits/I").c_str() );
00062     hostTree->Branch( (_enginePrefix+"hitEnergy").c_str(), &_trackHitEnergy, 
00063                       (_enginePrefix +"hitEnergy[" + _enginePrefix +"numTrackHits]/F").c_str() );
00064      hostTree->Branch( (_enginePrefix+"hitType").c_str(), &_trackHitType, 
00065                       (_enginePrefix +"hitType[" + _enginePrefix +"numTrackHits]/I").c_str() );
00066     
00067 
00068 
00069   }

00071 
00072   void TrackFinderWriteEngine::fillVariables( LCEvent* evt )
00073   {
00074     LCCollection *inputCol;
00075     _fShowerStart = -10000;
00076     _fCalorimeterType = -10000;
00077 
00078     try
00079       {
00080         inputCol = evt->getCollection(_showerStartColName);
00081         int nEntries = inputCol->getNumberOfElements();
00082    
00083         for (int i = 0; i < nEntries; ++i)
00084           {
00085             LCGenericObject *showerStartLayerObj = dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(inputCol->getElementAt(i));
00086 
00087             /*calorimeter type: 0=ECAL, 1=first 30 layers in HCAL, 2=last coarse part of HCAL*/
00088             _fCalorimeterType = showerStartLayerObj->getIntVal(0);
00089             _fShowerStart     = showerStartLayerObj->getIntVal(1);
00090 
00091             // Keep the orginal information from PTF As the user requested.
00092             // Please consult the "PrimaryTrackFinder" for the meaning of number.
00093           }
00094         
00095       }
00096     catch ( DataNotAvailableException err )
00097       {
00098         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<  "WARNING: Collection " << _showerStartColName << " not available in event " << evt->getEventNumber() << std::endl;
00099       }
00100 
00101     /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00102     
00103     _eSumTrack = 0;
00104 
00105     streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"\n\n track col name: "<<_trackColName<<std::endl;
00106 
00107     try
00108       {
00109         inputCol = evt->getCollection(_trackColName);
00110         int nEntries = inputCol->getNumberOfElements();
00111         _numTrackHits = nEntries;
00112 
00113         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"\n\n track entries: "<<nEntries<<std::endl;
00114 
00115         if ( (unsigned) nEntries >  MAXLAYERS ) {
00116           streamlog_out(ERROR) << " Please check the error: Number of track entries is larger than MAXLAYERS" <<std::endl;
00117           streamlog_out(ERROR) << " Number of track entries :"<< _numTrackHits << " and MAXLAYERS : "<< MAXLAYERS <<std::endl;
00118           throw std::range_error(" numTrackHit > MAXLAYERS, index out of bounds!");
00119         }
00120 
00121   
00122         for (int i = 0; i < nEntries; ++i)
00123           {
00124             CalorimeterHit *hit = dynamic_cast<CalorimeterHit*>(inputCol->getElementAt(i));
00125             
00126 
00127             /*calorimeter type: 0=ECAL, 1=first 30 layers in HCAL, 2=last coarse part of HCAL*/
00128             int type = hit->getType();
00129             _trackHitType[i] = type;
00130             
00131             float energy = hit->getEnergy();
00132             _trackHitEnergy[i] = energy;
00133 
00134             _eSumTrack += energy;
00135 
00136           }/*end loop over hits*/
00137         
00138       }
00139     catch ( DataNotAvailableException err )
00140       {
00141         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<  "WARNING: Collection " << _trackColName << " not available in event " << evt->getEventNumber() << std::endl;
00142       }
00143 
00144     streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"eSumTrack: "<<_eSumTrack<<std::endl;
00145 
00146   }
00147 
00148 } //namespace marlin
